ext_descriptions.ext_description: The valid_context_partitions rule ensures that all instances of product_definition are such that the product_definition_context that is referred to as their frame_of_reference is not also referred to as one of the additional contexts where the product definition is relevant.
there shall not be any instance of product_definition such the result of the evaluation of the initial_context_is_additional function is true.

The initial_context_is_additional function evaluates whether the product_definition_context that is referred to as the frame_of_reference of a product_definition is also associated to this product_definition with an instance of product_definition_context_association with role 'additional context'.
The result of the function is TRUE if at least such an association is found.
the product_definition whose frame of reference is considered.
